title: Jacob Goes to Egypt
summary: Genesis 46 records Jacob’s journey to Egypt after learning that Joseph is alive. God reassures him in a vision. The chapter lists the descendants of Jacob who move to Egypt, and Joseph and Jacob are reunited.

faq.question: What did God say to Jacob on the way to Egypt?
faq.answer: God told him not to be afraid and promised to make him a great nation in Egypt.

faq.question: How many people from Jacob’s family went to Egypt?
faq.answer: Seventy members of Jacob’s family went with him to Egypt.
